item.title: Adjust the timer for attacking an NPC
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

Right now it seems as though there is no timer at all. When you attack an npc, there is no pause between hits. Iâ€™m using a wL (TestScape, cause Im the bawss) server, and the only thing that hints at a timer is the action timer:

if (FightType == 4) // controlled
		{
			addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[1]), 0);
			addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[1]), 0);
			addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[1]), 0);
			addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[3]), 3);
			addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[13]), 13);
                        actionTimer = 10;
			
		}

Would I edit actionTimer? Also, how relative is the integer set in terms of seconds?

Read full topic
item.source: Adjust the timer for attacking an NPC
